summary: The diff implements REQ-3 (button rename) but does not provide evidence of implementing REQ-1 and REQ-2 (compact routine containers with scrolling). The MorningRoutine.tsx diff is truncated before showing the container implementation, making verification incomplete.

missing_requirements.requirement: Modify the Morning Routine container in MorningRoutine.tsx to have a compact height that displays a maximum of 4 rows of routine items with vertical scrolling when exceeded
missing_requirements.reason: The MorningRoutine.tsx diff is truncated and does not show any container styling or max-height implementation for the Morning Routine section. No evidence of 4-row limit or scrollable container implementation is visible in the provided diff.
